body.name: DYPER Viscose from Bamboo Baby Diapers Size 3 | Unscented, Hypoallergenic, Plant-Based Disposable Diapers for Sensitive Skin, 68 Count

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed. The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: KIND TO BABY: Experience plant-based* disposable diapers designed for sensitive newborn, preemie, and toddler skin. Outer and inner layers are made with 100% Viscose from Bamboo for improved comfort, superior wicking, and maximum fluid retention.

STRETCHY, SOFT, COMFORTABLE: Remarkably soft to the touch, absorbent, and thoughtfully made with honest ingredients. They feel more like yoga-pants than conventional diapers with an almost underwear-like fit.

ABSORBENT, SAFE, VERSATILE: Certified to the highest OEKO-TEX consumer safety standards. Clinically tested and 5-star rated by dermatologists. Great as a cloth diaper alternative, for potty training boys & girls, nighttime protection, and swaddler time.

RESPONSIBLE & MADE WITH PLANT-BASED* MATERIALS: Our infant diapers are parent’s choice because they are made without chlorine, latex, alcohol, perfumes, PVC, lotions, TBT, parabens, sulphates, & phthalates. They are unprinted, unscented, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free to protect the next generation.
Each package contains 68 Size 3 (Medium) diapers for babies 16-28 lb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The absolute best!
reviews.reviewText: We’ve tried almost every brand out there and these have become our favorite. They’re soft and absorbent and gentle on baby’s skin. Some brands have caused diaper rash, others have had blow outs, others haven’t fit well, etc. but these… these have been amazing from day one! And they’re plain white which means they don’t show through pants or bloomers. Since they’re bamboo, they don’t make that swish swish noise (you know what I’m talking about lol) when she walks either! She’s a silent little ninja now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I use organic cloth diapers on an every day basis, but needed something easier & hassle free for a short out of town trip & flight. I researched quality & effectiveness of multiple brands & decided to try Dyper.These are sooo good! They’re super absorbent & hold everything in exceptionally well so that we had no blowouts (yay!). They’re also very thin when folded (a novelty for me after using bulkier cloth) & so soft.Planning a month long trip to the UK & will definitely be using these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO soft, size down if stuck between two
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these diapers, but I’ve found my daughter falls between sizes 3 and 4 weighing 24lbs. She is long and tall. The size 3 is a very snug fit, but works fantastic. Size 4 seems to fit better with a little room to spare, but then they leak from the thighs.. esp poops which is NO fun. And I make sure to always pull the safe guards out.I also love how these diapers don’t get wet on the outside like Huggies and I truly feel I need to change her less with these over Huggies because they’re more absorbent, so I go through less!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Preferred disposable diapers
reviews.reviewText: I needed a diaper that we could use when we were on the go, as cloth diapering is my choice at home, but very inconvenient while out and about. I am very concerned about any toxic products touching my tender-skinned red headed baby & these diapers have won us over. These are the only ones he doesn’t instantly get a rash from and their sturdiness is nice! They are still soft and have nearly zero sound when he’s in them (compared to most other disposable diapers which sound like paper crinkling constantly).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the diapers but Amazon keeps sending the wrong size
reviews.reviewText: We keep ordering size 3 but now twice have got the wrong size. Something wrong with their inventory. Otherwise they are great diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this brand! I know they’re a little bit more than your average run-of-the-mill diapers, but the fact that 87% of the product completely biodegrade within eight months is amazing! It’s nice to know that we’re not polluting the environment with tons of plastic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product. As described. It is a strong, fabric feel diaper. No leaks, lasts through the night. The only downside I would say anyone would not is the lack of design on the actual diaper. Otherwise, excellent product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Non-toxic but have issues
reviews.reviewText: I need non toxic diapers for my baby and these were good in the sense of ingredients. They absorbed pretty well, however, the sides that you pull around from the back to stick to the front would constantly break so I wasn’t able to use most of the diapers.
